title: Mirror Ball
description: A mirror ball, also called a disco ball. A hanging sphere made up of a bunch of tiny mirrors, which reflect spots of light around a room, creating a party atmosphere.
apple_vendor_description: The mirror ball emoji on Apple devices gleams with countless tiny, reflective facets, each catching and scattering light with remarkable realism, a signature of Apple's detailed 3D rendering. Its spherical form is rendered with smooth gradients and bright highlights, suggesting a dynamic, shimmering surface. This emoji on Apple devices is synonymous with celebration, parties, dancing, and the vibrant energy of nightlife.
